definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: Is this image fresh enough to have an effect?
sentences.chinese: 这个形象的新鲜度够不够产生效果？

sentences.english: Serendipitous people are more fearless about trying something new.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔人们会更加勇于尝试新鲜事物。

sentences.english: Desalting of crude oil consumes huge quantity of fresh water.
sentences.chinese: 原油脱盐要消耗大量的新鲜水。

sentences.english: They weeded the mounds and piled fresh dirt atop.
sentences.chinese: 他们铲除坟上的杂草，再将在坟顶堆上新鲜的土。

sentences.english: Hot and fresh out of the dishwasher.
sentences.chinese: 从洗碗机里新鲜出炉的热腾腾的蛋糕。

sentences.english: The thirsty wayfarer was glad to find a fresh spring near the road.
sentences.chinese: 口渴的徒步旅行者很高兴在路边找到新鲜的泉水。

sentences.english: To keep a fresh supply take one or two cloves from each bulb and replant them.
sentences.chinese: 保持新鲜供给要花一至两丁香每个灯泡和补种。

sentences.english: Serve the sauce over fresh tagliatelle.
sentences.chinese: 将肉酱倒在新鲜面条上。

sentences.english: Basil will lose its freshness and shape if you place it in the refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 罗勒如果放冰箱里，会变得不新鲜，而且还会走形。

sentences.english: The fresh air and exercise cured him of his headache.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸新鲜空气和坚持锻炼把他的头痛病治好了。

sentences.english: The bread can be fresh or stale and crusts can be left on or removed.
sentences.chinese: 面包可新鲜或陈旧的和结壳可以留在或删除。

sentences.english: This fish isn\’t fresh; it smells!
sentences.chinese: 这条鱼不新鲜，已经发臭了。

sentences.english: Las Rocas Bar and Grill is the best spot for fresh seafood specialties.
sentences.chinese: 拉斯罗卡斯酒吧和烧烤是新鲜的海鲜特产的最佳位置。

sentences.english: He makes fresh orange juice with an electric extractor.
sentences.chinese: 他用电动榨汁机榨取新鲜的橙汁。

sentences.english: I snorted a few mouthfuls of fresh air, but also puts on a minor involuntarily.
sentences.chinese: 我吸了几口新鲜空气，又不由自主地哼起了小调。

sentences.english: We had some more new blood on our team.
sentences.chinese: 新鲜血液输入了我们的队伍中。

definition: vivid/lively/(of food ingredients) live or fresh
